Level 3 Annotation#

Outer enamel epithelium#

This cluster is annotated base on the study described in [Krivanek et al., 2020].

Inner enamel epithelium#

Based on the marker Sfrp5, Cldn10 [Hermans et al., 2022], we annotate this cluster as inner enamel epithelium.

Stratum intermedium#

Stratum intermedium markers (Thbd, Jph4) [Krivanek et al., 2020] are expressed in this cluster.

Early ameloblast#

We found a cluster specificly expressed mineralization marker Dspp, align with the study []. Base on it’s relationship with pre-ameloblast and secretory ameloblast, we annotate it as early ameloblast.
